rovers.name: Sojourner
rovers.Speciality: Being the first wheeled robot to rover the Red Planet

rovers.name: Spirit
rovers.Speciality: Finding evidence of water on Mars

rovers.name: Opportunity
rovers.Speciality: Finding evidence of water on Mars

rovers.name: Curiousity
rovers.Speciality: Finding out if Mars once had what all life needs: lasting water and the right chemical ingredients

rovers.name: Perseverance
rovers.Speciality: Looking for signs of past or present life and see if humas could one day explore Mars
